description: T10 Lime x 3(Tilia spp) reduce the height by 5m- reduce lateral growth by 3m- leave furnishing growth; T10 White Poplar x 1cut back from building by 3m- remove deadwood- clean out crown break; T108 White Poplar x 1 remove deadwood; 	T111 White Poplar x 1 reduce the lateral branch over the cars by 3m- cut back from streetlight, lift all round to 3m; T98	Lime x 6 (Tilia spp) lift to 4m- remove deadwood- remove basal growth; T88	Lombardy Poplar x (Populus nigra 'Italica')  lift to 4m- remove snapped out branches; T85	Lime x 1 (Tilia spp) lift all round to 4m- remove basal growth- remove significant deadwood; T84a Lime x 1(Tilia spp)  lift all round to 4m- remove basal growth- remove significant deadwood; T81Lombardy Poplar x 1(Populus nigra 'Italica')  lift all round to 4m; T42 Lime x 1 (Tilia spp)  lift to 4m- cut back limb overhanging the road by 2m.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
